results.title: Hypoglycemia-Induced Basal Ganglia Infarct: A Rare Case of Metformin Toxicity in a Hemodialysis Patient

results.title: [Metformin use and risk of ischemic stroke in patients with type 2 diabetes: A cohort study].
results.journal: Beijing Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: Compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ non-users, the Hazard ratio (HR) for @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users was 0.58 (95%CI: 0.36-0.93; P = 0.024).

results.title: Neuroprotective effects of oral metformin before stroke on cerebral small-vessel disease.
results.text_hl: We analyzed the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ on the neurological severity and functional outcome in each @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ subtype on logistic regression analysis with adjustments for multiple confounding factors.
